sentence.Network_en: The major clinical features are anemia, splenomegaly, and jaundice.
sentence.Network_cn: 主要的临床症状是贫血, 脾肿大和黄疸.
脾肿大几乎是经常存在的.

sentence.Network_en: One of the most common findings with portal hypertension is splenomegaly as seen here.
sentence.Network_cn: 图示,门脉高压的最常见并发症之一脾肿大.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 20th cent.: from splen- 'spleen' + Greek megas, megal- 'great'

means.word_mean: 1. an abnormal enlargement of the spleen
